channel.title: Missing Pet Tora mission
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Missing Pet Tora mission" - win jutsu found

item.title: Re: Missing Pet Tora mission
item.content:encoded: Thanks, I've always wondered about that particular mission :)

item.title: Missing Pet Tora mission
item.content:encoded:
I was running D-rank missions, trying to get Reaper items, and this mission came up. I decided to try something a bit unusual, and found out: the jutsu for an automatic win is All Fours Jutsu (and yes, it's -1 levels to genjutsu, so nobody would usually botherâ€¦)

In a funny way, the jutsu makes sense!
